function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Absence of evidence on precise COVID-19 IPC regimes for workplaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease outbreaks and superspreading events","Mitigation":"Conducting a synthesis of the evidence base on workplace COVID-19 IPC measures and their effectiveness","Technologies":"Evidence-based research and data analysis","People":"Workers in workplace settings","Owner":"Health authorities and researchers"},{"Description":"Lack of funding for adequate IPC programs, especially for small businesses","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of small businesses to infectious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Prioritizing funding for IPC initiatives, particularly for small businesses","Technologies":"Financial support and government funding programs","People":"Small business owners and employees","Owner":"Governments and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Consideration of masking alone as sufficient protection from SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks in the workplace","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks and transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Applying timely and comprehensive infection prevention and control measures","Technologies":"Advanced PPE and ventilation systems","People":"Workers in workplace settings","Owner":"Employers and workplace management"}]}
